PropertyList.title: EFA Typhoon
PropertyList.text:
U L P (Upper Left Panel) Autopilot and functions : *** Please refer to the Readme file in the eurofighter folder ***
Full Auto Start (Typhoon Menu) or Manual Start Procedure : Down Right Panel --> Battery switch, APU red button (wait a few seconds for the APU to spool up... "ON" showing) L and R Boost switches on Left LP cock on (under red cover), behind Throttles (Left Panel) Right LP cock on (under red cover), (down Right Panel) Start switch on and release MFDs as required, then lights and radios After start-up: APU off (red button again), canopy down (Red Button below right MFD) ----- End of your ride (and if you wish) Full Auto Shut down (Typhoon Menu)
Weapons Menu : Select your load (fuel and weapons) according to the mission you plan, AFTER startup and BEFORE Take-off You can check the result with "external view" or on the right MFD, STOR button
To fire a guided Missile, Rotate Master Arm Switch from "Safe" to "Live" (down Right Panel), Select "A/A :" on the HUD with "w" or right MFD, STOR, "A/A" Select the desired Air to Air missile (STOR page: Sel + or Sel -), Activate "lock" (right MFD, RADAR, hit "Mode" button : you switch to TWS-Auto), Aim with the HUD (Target indications showing on HUD), Fire with "e" when in range and locked (HUD black diamond steady)
Same procedure for Air to Ground missile, but select "A/G :" on the HUD (hit "w" again) or right MFD, STOR page, "A/G"
Note that "A/A :" will only display Air to Air armament "A/G :" will only display Air to Ground armament
The "N" key operates only if the jettison switch (close to the gear lever) is down (Tanks position, green light "ON" showing) - you can also push the "ON" button
Afterburners engage when throttles past 95%
* Max speed: Mach 2.0+ reheat Mach 1.2 without reheat * Min speed: 130 Kt (clean) stable with 9 AoA * Take off: 120 Kts (clean) - up to 190 Kts (with loads) * Stall: near 90 Kts (clean)
